alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 9:58AM CST until December 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Chickasawhay At Leakesville affecting Greene, Wayne and George Counties. For the Chickasawhay River...including Waynesboro, Leakesville... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay At Leakesville. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, flooding of lowlands will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 20.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CST Wednesday was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning and continue falling to 17.7 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
